ProjectTitle: Towards powerful early math instruction: Designing materials to improve (future) preschool teachers’ and preschoolers’ number and patterning competencies.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
17/05/2022
6. Once audio-recordings of interactions during the interventions have been transcribed, the recordings can be destroyed.
7. You could also consider depositing your data in KU Leuven RDR (Research Data Repository) (instead of OSF) to make them available for reuse, or to publish them linked to papers: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/rdr
Make sure data are anonymous before making them public (pseudonymous data are still considered as personal data by GDPR), this means that the file linking codes to personal identifiers needs to be destroyed.
label: good with suggestions
